string-array.item: Circular style
Oval style

string-array.name: descripcion
string-array.item: It generates circular shapes, which are displayed on screen
It generates oval shapes, which are displayed on the screen
It generates square shapes, which are displayed on screen
It generates rectangular shapes, which are displayed on the screen
Freestyle generates forms, which are displayed on the screen

string-array.name: formas
string-array.item: Selected Shape: Circle
Selected shape: Oval
Selected Shape: Square
Selecionada Shape: Rectangle
Selecionada shape: Freestyle

string-array.name: ayudaForma
string-array.item: Touch the screen to draw circles
Touch the screen to draw ovals
Touch the patanlla to draw pictures
Touch the patanlla to draw rectangles
Touch and make the way you want
